alert.note: Alert for Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 22 at 6:35PM CST until February 22 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CST FOR CENTRAL SCOTT COUNTY... At 635 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hillsboro, or near Harperville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Hillsboro around 640 PM CST. Harperville around 645 PM CST. Steele around 650 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
